info.title: AuthorizationManagementClient
info.description: Role based access control provides you a way to apply granular level policy administration down to individual resources or resource groups. These operations enable you to manage role assignments. A role assignment grants access to Azure Active Directory users.

get.description: Get the specified role management policy assignment for a resource scope

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role management policy.

parameters.name: roleManagementPolicyAssignmentName
parameters.description: The name of format {guid_guid} the role management policy assignment to get.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the role management policy.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create a role management policy assignment

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role management policy assignment to upsert.

parameters.name: roleManagementPolicyAssignmentName
parameters.description: The name of format {guid_guid} the role management policy assignment to upsert.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for the role management policy assignment.

201.description: Created - Returns the created or updated policy assignment.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Delete a role management policy assignment

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role management policy assignment to delete.

parameters.name: roleManagementPolicyAssignmentName
parameters.description: The name of format {guid_guid} the role management policy assignment to delete.

200.description: OK - Successfully deleted the policy assignment.

204.description: NoContent - policy assignment does not exists.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets role management assignment policies for a resource scope.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role management policy.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of role management policies.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

roleDefinitionId.description: The role definition of management policy assignment.

policyId.description: The policy id role management policy assignment.

RoleManagementPolicyAssignmentProperties.description: Role management policy assignment properties with scope.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

RoleManagementPolicyAssignmentListResult.description: Role management policy assignment list operation result.

CloudError.description: An error response from the service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the service.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.
